title: Nritya Sangam
description: A vibrant Warli painting showing villagers celebrating a wedding with dancers around a large sacred tree, featuring traditional earthy tones and geometric figures.
materials: Digitally printed on high-quality, eco-friendly wallpaper with fade-resistant inks.

title: Harmony of the Herd
description: A stylized depiction of deer gathered in a forest, rendered with intricate dots and lines.

title: Madhubani Painting
description: A peacock in Madhubani painting symbolizes divine love, prosperity, and romance, depicted with vibrant colors, intricate patterns, and geometric motifs that fill every space, reflecting the art’s deep connection to nature and cultural beliefs

title: Warli Art
description: Tribal geometric paintings representing daily life.

title: Kalamkari
description: Narrative textile painting with hand-drawn motifs.
